attributes.action: New laws to make sure media is in no way connected or influenced with the goverment or any other politcal movements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its about time we had unbiased news reports. Lets see the real news in todays world of a free scoiety and not hide behind any more propaganda or the very rich and poltical persuasive view on our world today. With new laws we can have the peoples news and no influences that lead us to false beliefs. If there is nothing to hide then why not, i would like to hear their response. If not please sign here
